sections.heading: Hero Section
sections.content: IIAHM Kokrajhar is proud to be recognized as the No. 1 Global Placement Management Program in Northeast India within just 5 years of establishment.

sections.heading: Mission
sections.content: Our mission is to make international-standard career opportunities accessible to the youth of Northeast India — transforming lives, building careers, and creating success stories every year.

sections.heading: About Us
sections.content: Since our inception, we have empowered hundreds of young professionals with world-class training in Hospitality, Hotel Management, and Aviation, ensuring 100% job placement assistance both in India and abroad.

sections.heading: Scholarship
sections.content: Mijing Youth Foundation NGO - 80% Off Scholarship Program for Financially Weak Families.

contact_info.address: Kokrajhar, Tengapara, North Kokrajhar, SBI Building, 4th Floor

sections.heading: Headline
sections.content: Mijing Youth Foundation (Empowering Young Minds) - Turn Hopes Into Careers — Because Money Shouldn’t Decide Your Destiny.

sections.heading: About NGO
sections.content: At IIAHM Kokrajhar, we believe that talent, ambition, and hard work should never be held back by financial struggles. Every young person, no matter where they come from or what their family background is, deserves the chance to dream big and build a successful future. Our NGO initiative was launched to ensure that no youth’s potential goes to waste simply because of money. Through heavily subsidized hospitality, hotel management, and aviation programs — combined with guaranteed job placement support — we are opening doors for students who would otherwise be left behind.

sections.heading: Philosophy
sections.content: Your Dreams Should Fly — Not Be Limited by Money. Education is not a privilege, it’s a right. Opportunity should belong to everyone — and a brighter future should be within reach for every hardworking, deserving youth.

sections.heading: Course Details
sections.content: Duration: 3 Months. Eligibility: Minimum 10 + 2 passed. Certification with International Placement.

sections.heading: Departments
sections.content: Front Office Management, Food & Beverage Service, Housekeeping, General Administration, Reservation Officer, Event Management, and Food Production.

sections.heading: Job Assistance
sections.content: 100% job assistance in top 5-star hotels and resorts both National and International.

sections.heading: Mission
sections.content: To give wings to lakhs of dreams of youths from all over Northeast India by making our platform affordable and easily accessible.

sections.heading: Vision
sections.content: To be the top upskilling platform of Northeast India and to boost youth employment through practical skills with placement to top organisations and companies in the world.

sections.heading: Institute History
sections.content: Ian Institute is the first-ever professional Skill Development Training Institute based in Kokrajhar, Assam. They provide professional training in the Aviation and Hotel Management industries.

sections.heading: Overview
sections.content: Integrated Diploma Course Programs focusing on Aviation, Hospitality, and Tourism industries.

sections.heading: Benefits
sections.content: Attractive salary packages, global travel opportunities, flexible schedules, health/retirement benefits, flight/hotel discounts, luxury lifestyle.

sections.heading: Curriculum
sections.content: Job roles & responsibilities, flight schedules, customer handling, crowd management, interpersonal skills, communication, grooming, technical skills, personality development.

sections.heading: Support
sections.content: We'd love to hear from you.

contact.address: Kokrajhar, Tengapara, North Kokrajhar, SBI Building, 4th Floor
